name: The Characters of Harrison Ford Trivia Game | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the name of Harrison Ford's character in "American Graffiti"?
questions.explanation:
Bob Falfa.

	"American Graffit" was George Lucas's homage to the early 1960's.  The movie deals with a group of teenagers in 1962 spending their last night together before heading off to college.  The movie also starred Ron Howard, Cindy Williams, Paul LeMat, Richard Dreyfuss, MacKenzie Phillips, and Suzanne Sommers.

questions.text: In the 1967 movie "Dead Heat on a Merry-Go-Round", Harrison Ford made his movie debut in an uncredited appearance.  What was his character?
questions.explanation:
Bell hop.

	This movie was directed by Bernard Gerard and starred Todd Armstrong and Ben Astar.

questions.text: For which character was Harrison Ford first nominated for an Academy Award for Best Actor?
questions.explanation:
John Book.

	His first Oscar nomination was for playing the role of John Book in "Witness". He ended up losing that award to William Hurt in "Kiss of the Spider Woman".

questions.text: Which of the following characters did NOT garner Harrison Ford a Golden Globe nomination?
questions.explanation:
Dr. Richard Walker

	Dr. Richard Walker was his character in "Frantic", Allie Fox was his character in "The Mosquito Coast", Dr. Richard Kimble was his character in "The Fugitive", and Linus Larrabee was his character in "Sabrina".  He did not win for any of these movies.

questions.text: In which movie did Harrison Ford play Rusty Sabich?
questions.explanation:
Presumed Innocent.

	"Presumed Innocent" was based on the novel of the same name by Scott Turow and co-starred Bonnie Bedelia, Brian Denehy, and Raul Julia.

questions.text: In which movie did Harrison Ford have a bit part as the school principal, but the scene was cut before theatrical release?
questions.explanation:
E. T.

	This scene was restored for the 20th Anniversary of the release of "E.T.".

questions.text: In which movie did he play the character Jack Ryan for the first time?
questions.explanation:
Patriot Games.

	Alec Baldwin originated the role of Jack Ryan in "The Hunt for Red October" before being replaced by Harrison Ford in "Patriot Games" and then "Clear and Present Danger" and then Ben Affleck played him in "The Sum of All Fears".  These movies were based on novels by Tom Clancy.

questions.text: In which movie did Harrison Ford play a character originally played by Humphrey Bogart?
questions.explanation:
Sabrina.

	Both Humphrey Bogart and Harrison Ford played Linus Larrabee from the movie "Sabrina".

questions.text: In which movie did Harrison Ford portray Rick Deckard?
questions.explanation:
Blade Runner.

	"Blade Runner" was based on the novel "Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep" by Phillip K. Dick. It was directed by Ridley Scott and co-starred Rutger Hauer, Sean Young, and Edward James Olmos.

questions.text: What was Harrison Ford's character's name in "Raiders of the Lost Ark"?
questions.explanation:
Indiana Jones & Henry Jones.

	"Raiders of the Lost Ark" was the first in the trilogy along with "Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom" and "Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade".
